casebody.data:
DAVIDSON COUNTY BROADCASTING COMPANY, INC., Larry W. Edwards, and wife, Shirley Edwards
v.
IREDELL COUNTY
v.
Wayne McConnell, Rusty N. McConnell, Ann and Don Scott, Bill Mitchell, and David Lowery, Intervening Respondents No. 314P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 16, 2017 Allegra Collins, Attorney at Law, for Davidson County Broadcasting Company, Inc., et al. Lisa Valdez, Attorney at Law, Alex M. Graziano, Attorney at Law, for Iredell County. Thomas E. Terrell, Jr., Attorney at Law, Kip David Nelson, Attorney at Law, for McConnell, Wayne, et al. Charles F. Marshall, III, Attorney at Law, S. Wilson Quick, Attorney at Law, for N.C. Association of Broadcasters.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 23rd of August 2016 by Petitioners in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."
